backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a dental clinic app defining types (Appointment, Review, Doctor, Service, etc.) and CRUD operations with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and blob storage via MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: replacing BookAppointmentDialog with a frictionless 4-field booking form and removing auth gates from all public-facing booking buttons.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component or page's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA with a root div and module script entry point, titled 'XYZ Dental Clinic'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router with all public and admin routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, CursorContextProvider, and shared Layout/AdminLayout wrappers.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users to the access-denied page, showing a spinner while auth state is loading.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Decorative fixed-position background component that renders 18 randomly positioned animated SVG particles (tooth, plus, sparkle, circle shapes) with CSS float animations.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: Renders an interactive before/after image comparison slider with drag support, fetching pairs from the backend or falling back to static/prop-provided pairs.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog form that collects patient name, phone, date, and service type to book an appointment, showing a success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top-of-page alert banner when the clinic status is 'closed' or 'emergency', hiding itself when the clinic is open.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Static contact section displaying phone, address, hours, a WhatsApp button, and an embedded Google Maps iframe.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: Replaces the default cursor with a smooth, eased custom cursor that expands on interactive elements and shows a dental icon when a special cursor mode is active.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Static section displaying the doctor's photo, credentials, bio, stats, and specialty tags in a two-column card layout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders four floating dental icon images with CSS bob animations and scroll-based parallax offsets as a decorative background layer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, and services list. Includes a hidden admin login modal triggered by triple-clicking the copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the fixed top navigation header with desktop/mobile nav links and a Book Appointment button. Includes a hidden admin login modal triggered by a 3-second long press on the logo.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the hero section with a parallax background image, headline text, and a Book Appointment button that opens the booking dialog.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: A dialog modal for admin login with hardcoded credentials that navigates to the admin dashboard on success. Triggered secretly from the header or footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout using a custom hook, showing loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: A fixed top progress bar that visually indicates scroll depth on the page using a teal-to-blue gradient.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of dental service cards fetched from a query hook, with special interactive cards for implants (3D rotation on hover) and Invisalign (before/after slider).
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: Auto-scrolling carousel that displays patient reviews fetched from the backend, falling back to hardcoded reviews if none are available, with star ratings and pause-on-hover behavior.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A scroll-triggered typewriter component that animates text character-by-character when the element enters the viewport, supporting configurable speed and HTML tag.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile, shown only when the user is logged in but has no existing profile.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: A scroll-reveal image component that scales and fades in an image when it enters the viewport using an IntersectionObserver-based hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: React context that tracks and exposes a global cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') for use across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access if a token is present and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Computer Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping all backend actor calls for appointments, clinic status, reviews, doctor availability, gallery blobs, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set an `isVisible` flag when a referenced element scrolls into view, triggering once and then unobserving.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Hook that animates a text scramble effect on an element when it enters the viewport, progressively resolving random characters to the target string over ~1 second.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Playfair Display fonts, sets up Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares animations for mesh background, floating elements, particles, and scroll reveal effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Simple access-denied page displaying a shield alert icon, an error message, and a button to navigate back to the home route.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments fetched via `useGetAllAppointments`, supports filtering by status, and allows inline status updates with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, tracking upload progress, and persisting pairs via `useAddBeforeAfterPair`, while also listing existing pairs.
Admin page for submitting new patient reviews with name, text, and star rating fields. Submitted reviews are saved in a pending state requiring approval before public display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard providing clinic open/closed and emergency status toggles, a recent appointments table, and navigation cards linking to all admin sub-pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors with name and specialty fields, and displaying the current list of doctors fetched from the backend.
Admin moderation page that lists pending patient reviews and allows admins to approve or delete each review with toast feedback.
Admin page for editing a predefined list of dental services, allowing updates to display name, description, and featured photo with upload progress tracking.
Detail page for the dental implants service, showing a hero section with typewriter title and zoom image, a benefits grid, and a step-by-step implant process, with data fetched via useGetService and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page that composes all major sections (hero, services, before/after, doctor, testimonials, contact) and conditionally shows a modal when the clinic status is closed.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service featuring a hero with typewriter text and zoom image, a benefits list, a before/after slider, and a step-by-step process, with service data loaded via useGetService.
Detail page for laser dentistry featuring an animated laser beam decoration, a hero section, benefits grid, and treatment steps, with service data fetched via useGetService and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for the Pediatric Dentistry service, fetching service data via `useGetService` and displaying a hero section, benefits list, and process steps with animated bubbles and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Generic service detail page that looks up a hardcoded map of dental services (root canal, braces, whitening, implants) by route param and renders the service's benefits, process steps, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Detail page for the Smile Makeover service, fetching service data via `useGetService` and rendering a hero section, benefits grid, before/after slider gallery, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (royal-blue, teal, CSS-variable-based design tokens), fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), border radii, and custom animations; includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 11) for a premium dental clinic website, documenting architectural decisions, existing features, known issues, and design guidelines such as the hidden admin panel trigger, zero-friction booking flow, and animation/glassmorphism approach.
